tag_list: earth, environment, technology, people, health, peace, love, life, world
overview: Justinian Cioroianu is engineer and has a good experience of work in the thermic and electric power field. He is researching to promote non-pollutant technologies because he saws that the humanity at present across the most important technological crisis by his history, for the people destroy the planet through environment pollution caused of the usage of old technologies. He has invented a new wind turbine in 1994 year. He made alone a beautiful car in 1991 year. He wrote a psycho-analysis book. He has a good experience in Photo Art and in Modelling. He plays at quitar is singer, writer, composer member in “Composers and Musicians Union by Romania”. He has a musical & movie factory studio and he is working hard everyday just for the purpose to send to all the people from the world the following messages through his work:” LIFE IS LOVE AND LOVE SAVES THE WORLD!”, “SAVE THE BLUE PLANET!” He is freelancer It, multimedia editor and video producer, an active militant online for environment protect and people health and for Peace & Love between people from all the world.
